com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features

Class DeviceTimestampFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.BlueSTSDK.Feature
      • com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features.DeviceTimestampFeature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeatureHeartRate

    public abstract class DeviceTimestampFeature
extends Feature
    Class that a feature has to extend if it doesn't has the timestamp field, as timestamp the system time will be used

        build a new disabled feature, that doesn't need to be initialized in the node side

    • Method Detail

      • update_priv

        protected int update_priv(long timeStamp,
                          byte[] data,
                          int dataOffset)
        Description copied from class: Feature
        update the feature internal data and notify the update to the listener

        if you overwrite this method, remember to update the the timestamp, the lastUpdate value and to acquire the write lock, when you finish you should to call the Feature.notifyUpdate(Sample) and Feature.logFeatureUpdate(byte[], Sample) for notify the update to the user

        This method will be called by a package protected method called by the node, in this way we can permit only to the node to call the update method, without export this functionality to the final user

        Overrides:
        update_priv in class Feature
        Parameters:
        timeStamp - package timestamp
        data - array of data where we will extract the data
        dataOffset - data offset fo the data array where we have to read
        Returns:
        number of read byte
